{"id":1114268032,"question_id":15,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"6 months, 1 week","timestamp":1701943600,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"264 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1114268032/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"51 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public List<List<Integer>> threeSum(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n\n        Set<List<Integer>> res = new HashSet<>();\n\n        for(int i=0; i<len ;i++){\n            int j=i+1;\n            int k = len-1;\n\n            while(j<k){\n                int sum = nums[i] + nums[j] + nums[k];\n                if(sum==0){\n                    List<Integer> list = Arrays.asList(nums[i], nums[j], nums[k]);\n                    res.add(new ArrayList<>(list));\n                    j++;\n                    k--;\n                }else if(sum<0){\n                    j++;\n                }else{\n                    k--;\n                }\n            }\n            \n        }\n\n        return new ArrayList<>(res);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
